name: Alice Johnson
review: The career counseling session was incredibly helpful in guiding me towards a career path that fits my strengths.

review: Resume review was thorough and gave me actionable tips to improve my application. Highly recommended!

review: The mock interview practice boosted my confidence and helped me improve my responses.

review: Great advice on LinkedIn profile optimization. My profile is now much more professional.

review: Career transition counseling was eye-opening and gave me clear steps to transition into a new role.

review: Cover letter writing session was fantastic. My cover letter now highlights my strengths effectively.

review: Networking strategy workshop provided practical insights into professional networking.

review: Personal branding session helped me stand out in job applications. Worth every penny!

review: The career goals session helped me clarify my ambitions and set actionable steps.

review: Salary negotiation workshop taught me valuable tactics. I feel much more prepared now.
